A Simple Bookmark Manager

A clean and simple interface to organize your favourite websites. Open a new browser tab and see your favourites load instantly. Try it for free.

Features

Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to acces your favourite websites. Your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can acces them on the go.

Bookmark in one click

Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple dra-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favourite sites.

Intelligent Search

Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple dra-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favourite sites.

Share your bookmarks

Easily share your bookmarks and collections widt others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.
